name: Classic English Breakfast Tea
method:
Step 1: Place black tea leaves in a teapot.
Step 2: Pour boiling water over the leaves and steep for 3-5 minutes.
Step 3: Strain the tea into a cup and add milk and sugar to taste.

name: Green Tea with Lemon
method:
Step 1: Steep green tea bags in hot water for 2-3 minutes.
Step 2: Squeeze fresh lemon juice into the tea.
Step 3: Stir in honey if desired.
Step 4: Serve over ice for a refreshing drink.

name: Chai Tea Latte
method:
Step 1: Brew black tea bags with spices in hot water.
Step 2: Heat milk on the stovetop until steaming.
Step 3: Mix the brewed tea with the steamed milk and add sugar to taste.
Step 4: Strain into a cup and enjoy!

name: Herbal Chamomile Tea
method:
Step 1: Place dried chamomile flowers in a teapot.
Step 2: Pour boiling water over the flowers and steep for 5-10 minutes.
Step 3: Strain the tea into a cup and sweeten with honey if desired.

name: Earl Grey Tea Latte
method:
Step 1: Brew Earl Grey tea bags in hot water.
Step 2: Heat milk on the stovetop with vanilla extract and sugar.
Step 3: Mix the brewed tea with the steamed milk.
Step 4: Strain into a cup and enjoy a comforting Earl Grey latte.
